item.description:
Have you wanted to learn to knit for a while but didn't know where to start? Did you dream of creating your very own unique project and then wearing it? Come have fun with us and learn this quiet and meditative skill!

We will meet for 3 Sundays to start and then possibly continue as we keep working on our projects. During our 90 minute classes, we will learn:

- Knit and purl stitches and simple patterns using them

- Different ways of reducing and adding stitches and effects they have on patterns

- How to read patterns and create your own simple ones

We will also pick a project to work on and start it. I suggest working on a scarf if you've never knitted before. Baby blankets are also simple and make great gifts.

Included in the class price is a ball of a gorgeous yarn from Green Mountain Spinnery. Pick one from here and I'll have it for you for the second class when you'll actually need it. Needles for this project are also included. A simpler yarn and needles for practice will be provided during classes only.

This class is definitely on, sorry for the late notice.
